nodes.description: Talk to Tohopka (beside Sigismund) to find out that you need pugil scales to collect the tear.

nodes.title: Get one set of Pugil Scales.
nodes.description: Get one set of Pugil Scales. You can get these from just about any Pugil, but the closest are Pug Pugils in East Sarutabaruta or Giddeus Pugil in Giddeus.

nodes.title: Go to the Starfall Hillock in West Sarutabaruta.
nodes.description: Go to the Starfall Hillock in West Sarutabaruta. Once there, go to the Twinkle Tree at I-6.

nodes.title: Target the base of the tree.
nodes.description: Target the base of the tree. Between the hours of 0:00 and 3:00, examining this spot will give you the message: A frost deposit at the base of the tree twinkles in the starlight.

nodes.title: If you have just finished Blue Ribbon Blues, you will have to zone out and back in to get the quest.
nodes.description: If you have just finished Blue Ribbon Blues, you will have to zone out and back in to get the quest. Also if you're on Windurst Mission 7-2 (Awakening of the Gods), you may have to talk to Ohbiru-Dohbiru twice.

nodes.title: Talk to Ohbiru-Dohbiru.
nodes.description: Talk to Ohbiru-Dohbiru. The Rhinostery wants you to kill Starmites in Toraimarai Canal. Collect all the Starmite Shells you can gather and bring them back to the Rhinostery.

nodes.title: Upon accepting the quest, you will receive a Rhinostery Certificate which will provide access to Tor
nodes.description: Upon accepting the quest, you will receive a Rhinostery Certificate which will provide access to Toraimarai Canal via Windurst Walls.

nodes.title: Speak with Wetata at (G-10) in Windurst Woods to start the quest and receive a Green institute card.
nodes.description: Speak with Wetata at (G-10) in Windurst Woods to start the quest and receive a Green institute card.

nodes.title: Speak with Kupipi in Heavens Tower to learn Trust: Kupipi.
nodes.description: Speak with Kupipi in Heavens Tower to learn Trust: Kupipi. If this is not your first Trust spell, you also receive the Windurst Trust permit and complete the quest at this point. If this is your first Trust spell, cast Trust: Kupipi in either West Sarutabaruta or East Sarutabaruta and return to Kupipi in Heavens Tower to receive the Windurst Trust permit and complete the quest.

missions.title: Truth, Justice, and the Onion Way!

nodes.title: Speak with Kohlo-Lakolo at G-5 in Port Windurst and watch a cutscene explaining the current situatio
nodes.description: Speak with Kohlo-Lakolo at G-5 in Port Windurst and watch a cutscene explaining the current situation.

nodes.title: Kohlo-Lakolo will ask that you bring him a Rarab Tail.
nodes.description: Kohlo-Lakolo will ask that you bring him a Rarab Tail. Rarab Tail is dropped by bumblebees in East Sarutabaruta and West Sarutabaruta. It can be bought from the following for 22~28 gil: Sarutabaruta regional vendor. If Windust controls Sarutabaruta, that would be Baehu-Faehu in Windurst Waters (North) (G-5). Ansegusele Western Adoulin (I-11) Green Thumb Moogle in Mog Garden with the Mandragora sproutling memento

nodes.title: Leepe-Hoppe requires three items:.
nodes.description: Leepe-Hoppe requires three items:

nodes.title: If you've just completed Tuning In, wait 1 earth minute before continuing.
nodes.description: If you've just completed Tuning In, wait 1 earth minute before continuing.

nodes.title: Talk to Leepe-Hoppe to receive this quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Leepe-Hoppe to receive this quest.

nodes.title: Travel to Kazham and speak with Jakoh Wahcondalo (the Chieftainess) (J-9).
nodes.description: Travel to Kazham and speak with Jakoh Wahcondalo (the Chieftainess) (J-9).

nodes.title: Go to the Mihgo's residence and speak with Romaa Mihgo (H-11).
nodes.description: Go to the Mihgo's residence and speak with Romaa Mihgo (H-11). She will ask you to travel to Gemini Falls in Yuhtunga Jungle.

nodes.title: Kill the Hill Lizards in Meriphataud Mountains until they drop a Twinstone Earring.
nodes.description: Kill the Hill Lizards in Meriphataud Mountains until they drop a Twinstone Earring.

nodes.title: Bring it back to Gioh Ajihri at (K-5) for a reward.
nodes.description: Bring it back to Gioh Ajihri at (K-5) for a reward.

nodes.title: IMPORTANT: Unlike most repeatable quests, you must zone to repeat the quest AND talk to Gioh Ajihri
nodes.description: IMPORTANT: Unlike most repeatable quests, you must zone to repeat the quest AND talk to Gioh Ajihri to effectively "restart" the quest, as she will not accept another Twinstone Earring from you until after she asks for another one.

nodes.title: Talk to Perih Vashai Windurst Woods (K-7) to continue the search for the sinner.
nodes.description: Talk to Perih Vashai Windurst Woods (K-7) to continue the search for the sinner. If you just completed Fire and Brimstone you need to zone before you will be given this quest. You have to be ranger to start the quest, however you can talk to Koh Lenbalalako and fight the NM as any job.

nodes.title: You are sent to Mhaura to find a mithra.
nodes.description: You are sent to Mhaura to find a mithra. Koh Lenbalalako is standing in the corner of the Smithing Guild in Mhaura (F-9) (speak to her twice to get cut scene) and tells you part of a story and wont tell the rest until you give her a Gold Earring.

nodes.title: Obtain a Gold Earring and trade it to Koh Lenbalalako for her to finish her story about the sinner a
nodes.description: Obtain a Gold Earring and trade it to Koh Lenbalalako for her to finish her story about the sinner and Xarcabard. She will give you Koh's Letter (key item). If there are no Gold Earrings on sale at the AH you can obtain one by completing the Conquest RoE Mission in Xarcabard.

nodes.title: Follow the sinner to Xarcabard and watch a cutscene as you zone in.
nodes.description: Follow the sinner to Xarcabard and watch a cutscene as you zone in. The location of the cutscene changes depending on if you zoned in through Beaucedine Glacier or not.

nodes.title: Go to the cave at (E-7) and examine the ??? for a cutscene after which the tiger will spawn.
nodes.description: Go to the cave at (E-7) and examine the ??? for a cutscene after which the tiger will spawn.

nodes.title: Kill Koenigstiger.
nodes.description: Kill Koenigstiger. The tiger Notorious Monster.

nodes.title: After killing Koenigstiger, go to the cave at (E-8) (opposite side of the zone), examine the ??? and
nodes.description: After killing Koenigstiger, go to the cave at (E-8) (opposite side of the zone), examine the ??? and watch another cutscene.

nodes.title: Re-examine the ??? at (E-8) again to get a reward of 99 Ice Arrows.
nodes.description: Re-examine the ??? at (E-8) again to get a reward of 99 Ice Arrows.

nodes.title: Return to Windurst Woods and talk to Perih Vashai to complete the quest and receive your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Windurst Woods and talk to Perih Vashai to complete the quest and receive your reward.

nodes.title: Go to south Windurst Waters and speak to Kerutoto (J-8) in the Rhinostery's north wing to receive a
nodes.description: Go to south Windurst Waters and speak to Kerutoto (J-8) in the Rhinostery's north wing to receive a Vial of Dream Incense. This quest may fail to trigger if Food for Thought is activated first.

nodes.title: Enter the Pso'Xja tower at (H-8) in Beaucedine Glacier.
nodes.description: Enter the Pso'Xja tower at (H-8) in Beaucedine Glacier. (This is the tower right behind the Survival Guide).

nodes.title: In this tower, there are shimmering walls of different colors.
nodes.description: In this tower, there are shimmering walls of different colors. Every time you enter one you zone. The order of walls you want is red, purple, red, purple. After the last purple zone, ride the elevator down.

nodes.title: Enter The Shrouded Maw (via Pso'Xja, similar to Chains of Promathia Chapter 3-5) There's a Home Poin
nodes.description: Enter The Shrouded Maw (via Pso'Xja, similar to Chains of Promathia Chapter 3-5) There's a Home Point right before the battlefield circle.

nodes.title: Examine the Memento Circle and select "Waking Dreams" when you are ready.
nodes.description: Examine the Memento Circle and select "Waking Dreams" when you are ready. Trust Magic cannot be called here.

nodes.title: Defeat Diabolos to acquire a Whisper of Dreams.
nodes.description: Defeat Diabolos to acquire a Whisper of Dreams.

nodes.title: Take the Whisper of Dreams to Kerutoto to choose your reward.
nodes.description: Take the Whisper of Dreams to Kerutoto to choose your reward. You can re-enter the Stone Gate to use the Home Point to teleport to Windurst Waters Home Point #3

nodes.title: Ohbiru-Dohbiru in the Rhinostery asks you to go to Giddeus and get him some water from the spring th
nodes.description: Ohbiru-Dohbiru in the Rhinostery asks you to go to Giddeus and get him some water from the spring there.

nodes.title: Take the Rhinostery Canteen he gives you to Giddeus to the spring at (K-12) or (E-12) and trade to i
nodes.description: Take the Rhinostery Canteen he gives you to Giddeus to the spring at (K-12) or (E-12) and trade to it for a Canteen of Giddeus Water. Note that if you have access to Domenic's warp service in Lower Jeuno, you can warp to Balga's Dais which will put you very close to one of the springs when you zone out to Giddeus. Alternatively, if you've already visited the Giddeus Home Point, you can simply warp there yourself from any Home Point at a cheaper rate than what Domenic offers.) The Rhinostery Canteen is a usable item, and you can 'use' it on the spring. As such, it will appear at the beginning of the item list, not after the equipment items.

nodes.title: Trade the Canteen of Giddeus Water to Ohbiru-Dohbiru for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade the Canteen of Giddeus Water to Ohbiru-Dohbiru for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk with Honoi-Gomoi again after zoning.
nodes.description: Talk with Honoi-Gomoi again after zoning.

nodes.title: Speak with Kohlo-Lakolo Port Windurst (G-5).
nodes.description: Speak with Kohlo-Lakolo Port Windurst (G-5)

nodes.title: Go to the House of the Hero in Windurst Walls.
nodes.description: Go to the House of the Hero in Windurst Walls. You will meet either Joker or Apururu.

nodes.title: Go to Toraimarai Canal and open a coffer for the Joker Card.
nodes.description: Go to Toraimarai Canal and open a coffer for the Joker Card. Picking the coffer as a Thief will work. the Tor. Coffer key can be brought from the curio vendor moogle if you have rhapsody in umber.

nodes.title: Return the card for your reward.
nodes.description: Return the card for your reward. If you spoke to Joker, return to the House of the Hero, If you spoke to Apururu, find her at the Manustery in Windurst Woods.

nodes.title: Finally, talk to Honoi-Gomoi to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Finally, talk to Honoi-Gomoi to complete the quest.

nodes.title: If you have just completed the previous quest, you will need to zone before receiving this quest.
nodes.description: If you have just completed the previous quest, you will need to zone before receiving this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Hakkuru-Rinkuru.
nodes.description: Talk to Hakkuru-Rinkuru.

nodes.title: First: Talk with following NPCs who are all in the Orastery, where you just talked with Hakkuru-Rink
nodes.description: First: Talk with following NPCs who are all in the Orastery, where you just talked with Hakkuru-Rinkuru Goltata, Captain of the WHM brigade, who talks about an Oak Staff. Yaman-Hachuman, Captain of the BLM brigade, who talks about a Mythril Rod. Ohruru, Captain of the RDM brigade, who talks about a Rose Wand.

nodes.title: Trade the weapons to Hakkuru-Rinkuru.
nodes.description: Trade the weapons to Hakkuru-Rinkuru.

nodes.title: Your reward is a New Moon Armlets, 4800g and two of the three items back.
nodes.description: Your reward is a New Moon Armlets, 4800g and two of the three items back.

nodes.title: Acquire a piece of Rosewood Lumber.
nodes.description: Acquire a piece of Rosewood Lumber.

nodes.title: Travel to Windurst Waters North (F-10) (Home Point #4); bottom floor of Timbre Timbers Tavern.
nodes.description: Travel to Windurst Waters North (F-10) (Home Point #4); bottom floor of Timbre Timbers Tavern.

nodes.title: Speak with Jatan-Paratan and he'll ask you how you feel about his music.
nodes.description: Speak with Jatan-Paratan and he'll ask you how you feel about his music. Answer his questions. It may take several answers until he will start to talk about the tavern and ask you your opinion. Saying that you don't recall the music (the last possible answer) and then talking to him again should start him talking about the tavern. The quest should now enter your log.

nodes.title: Talk to Aramu-Paramu for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Aramu-Paramu for a cutscene. He will express his worries about Jatan-Paratan.

nodes.title: Travel to Lower Jeuno (H-8), inside Merry Minstrel Meadhouse.
nodes.description: Travel to Lower Jeuno (H-8), inside Merry Minstrel Meadhouse.

nodes.title: Speak with Ruslan who instructs you to give a Rosewood Lumber to Jatan-Paratan.
nodes.description: Speak with Ruslan who instructs you to give a Rosewood Lumber to Jatan-Paratan.

nodes.title: Travel back and trade a Rosewood Lumber to Jatan-Paratan for a cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Travel back and trade a Rosewood Lumber to Jatan-Paratan for a cutscene and your reward.
